subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A 23-year-old woman found fatally shot in a Phoenix alley has been identified as the daughter of the former N.F.L. lineman Luis Sharpe, authorities said.The body of Leah Tamara Sharpe was discovered early Tuesday, and the police said investigators believed it was dumped there. Luis Sharpe played in the N.F.L. from 1982-94 for the Cardinals in St. Louis and Arizona and was a three-time Pro Bowl selection.
